reasoning: Rare neuroendocrine tumors arising from extra-adrenal paraganglia. Incidence ~0.3 per 100k based on population-based registry studies. Includes head/neck and extra-adrenal abdominal/thoracic paragangliomas.
source: Erickson D et al. (2001). Benign paragangliomas: clinical presentation and treatment outcomes in 236 patients. J Clin Endocrinol Metab. 86(11):5210-5216
